name: Senior QA Engineer, iTero
description:
We’re looking for Senior QA Engineer who will be responsible for functional testing activities for backend services, web portals and web applications, which allows iTero scanners end-users to manage patients and track orders statuses.

Our team prepares and runs manual functional progression, regression and perfomance testing packs for new iTero releases testing phases to ensure the product quality and to mitigate quality-related risks. One of the first tasks will be to test the product in the new conditions of the cloud infrastructure (AWS)

We are looking for a person with strong analytical mindset, attention to details. The person who loves to dig into the details, curious by nature.

In this role, you will…

  • Estimate testing effort for new features\user stories checking
  • Support functional testing model in Testing Management Tool
  • Create and present test strategies
  • Ensure stable testing environments and valid testing data preparation for testing cycles
  • Run manual test cases during releases testing cycles
  • Create bug reports in JIRA, validate defect fixes for product updates
  • Update testing reports with test execution results
  • Participate in auto testing scripts implementation and support
  • Provide knowledge transfer sessions on iTero business flows to other teams
  • Participate in project releases delivery to production (on demand)
  • Ensure the quality of not only the code, but also - requirements & processes

In this role, you’ll need …

  • At least 3 years (desirable 5+ years) of experience in manual testing of Web (on frontend, backend, databases levels)
  • Deep understanding of software development life cycle
  • Experience in working Agile\SCRUM methodologies
  • Testing cloud platforms experience, as well as experienced with SignalFX
  • Testing Automation experience will be a s plus
  • Test design and test execution experience for large end-2-end integrated systems\business flows\API\services testing
  • Proven experience working with JIRA, TM4J, Confluence, Git, Bamboo
  • Analytic way of thinking, ability to systematize information and learn complex things quickly
  • Strong interpersonal skills with ability to work both independently and as part of a team
  • English (written and spoken)

Benefits:

  • Interesting tasks and the opportunity to work on an innovative product in a strong team
  • Full medical insurance for employees and their children (including dentistry), life insurance, travel insurance
  • 100% paid sick leave
  • 28 days of paid vacation per year + 3 additional days
  • Lunch allowance
  • Sports and ergonomics of the home workplace
  • Discounts on Invisalign treatment for employees and their family members
  • English courses payment
  • Courses/books/conferences for professional development payment
  • Comfortable office with gym ("Danilovskaya Manufactory", Tulskaya metro station)
  • Remote work for the pandemic period (hybrid format is possible)
